patthana21.21:4.1: Nahetuṃ nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.21:5.1: Nahetuṃ naavitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.21:6.1: Nahetuṃ naavitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.21:6.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
